name: Adrift In The Wastes.
description:
Take control of a robot with a time travel watch, Switch between the ruined present and the lush past.
Solve puzzles using this time jumping ability to fix the present into a lush future!

Controls:
Keyboard:
 A and D for movement.
 Space to Jump
 E for time shift 
Controller:
 Joystick for Movement
 Button0 for jump
 Button2 for time shift
